personal.name: Shreyans Jain
personal.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
personal.subtitle: Passionate about building scalable applications with cutting-edge technologies. Experienced in TypeScript, React, Node.js, and Flutter with a focus on clean architecture and performance optimization.
personal.bio: Experienced full-stack developer with expertise in TypeScript, React, Node.js, and Flutter. Passionate about technical leadership, architecture decision-making, and mentoring development teams.

experience.description: Leading the complete refactor and optimization of the Themis Lender BRE (Business Rule Engine) and architecting scalable solutions for the lending platform.
achievements: Led the complete refactor and optimization of the Themis Lender BRE using TypeScript, resulting in a 50% increase in product stability, performance, and enhanced developer experience

Architected and developed a scalable Lender Dashboard to manage interactions with multiple lenders, enabling efficient configuration of loan criteria and business rules‚Äîcontributing to a 20% improvement in loan approval accuracy
Created a pluggable BRE rules framework to support diverse loan journeys, reducing custom logic duplication by 60% and enabling unified governance across thousands of business rules
Improved API performance by 40% through the implementation of advanced caching strategies and backend optimization techniques
Delivered a centralized rule management platform that simplified rule creation, modification, approval, and analytics‚Äîboosting lender operational efficiency and decision-making speed
Re-architected the SDK into a monorepo structure, improving modularity, reducing frontend load times by 22%, and streamlining integration and maintenance processes
Replaced legacy flow system with modular flow architecture, cutting deployment complexity and reducing rollout times from 4 days to 2.5 days, enabling 30% faster feature delivery
Streamlined merchant configuration by introducing feature toggles and auto-propagating settings, reducing config size by 60% and removing the need for 90% of hotfix release cycles

experience.description: Managed the enhancement of the Juspay Loan Marketplace at Juspay CREDIT, delivering scalable product solutions and optimizing system performance.
achievements: Managed the enhancement of the Juspay Loan Marketplace at Juspay CREDIT, delivering scalable product solutions, optimizing system performance by 30%, and improving user experience across multiple lender integrations
Implemented bundle splitting using Webpack and code compression with Brotli, resulting in a 30% reduction in bundle size and a significant decrease in time to render the first screen
Transitioned from PR-level contributions to leading repository management, establishing version control practices and improving team delivery by 25%
Resolved 15+ production issues through root cause analysis and implementation of preventive measures, ensuring 99.9% uptime for products and services
Revamped website flows and merchant/lender flows, reducing the frequency of misdirected user service queries by 30%

experience.description: Transitioned to a full-time role post-internship due to consistent delivery and initiative. Developed the design and development of the Hyper Credit Loan Journey MVP.
achievements: Transitioned to a full-time role post-internship due to consistent delivery and initiative. Developed the design and development of the Hyper Credit Loan Journey MVP, resulting in a production-ready flow that now supports 10K+ user sessions monthly

Led the comprehensive onboarding of lenders and merchants into the frontend systems, significantly improving application functionality and user experience this integration leading to a 30% increase in loan approvals
Executed time-sensitive initiatives to navigate challenging merchant lender issues, ensuring on-time resolution; resolving 20% of loan payment discrepancies

experience.description: Completed functional programming training and provided guidance to other interns while contributing to production code.
achievements: Completed 3-month functional programming training in Haskell and PureScript, applying concepts in production code and improving module test coverage by 25% through more declarative, type-safe implementations
Provided guidance and support to other interns, helping them understand the codebase which increased productivity by 20%

projects.title: Havo Backend
projects.description: The Node.js backend for the mobile application serves a noble purpose by empowering individuals who are unable to speak. Through the integration of a Machine Learning Library, it enables the conversion of handwritten text into speech, allowing users to save their daily conversations in the form of phrases.
projects.longDescription: Havo Backend is a Node.js application designed to help individuals with speech disabilities. The system integrates machine learning capabilities to convert handwritten text into speech, enabling users to communicate more effectively. Users can save and manage their daily conversations as phrases for quick access.

projects.title: Eats
projects.description: Built a responsive UI/UX frontend for a food delivery application inspired by real-world use cases. The application features intuitive navigation for browsing restaurants, viewing menus, and placing orders, with a focus on mobile-first design, component reusability, and seamless user experience across devices.
projects.longDescription: Eats is a comprehensive food delivery application frontend built with Vue.js and Vuetify. The application provides an intuitive interface for users to browse restaurants, view detailed menus, and place orders seamlessly. The design prioritizes mobile-first approach with responsive components that work across all devices.

projects.title: Github Profile Finder
projects.description: Created a Flutter-based cross-platform mobile application that integrates with GitHub's API to provide users with a seamless and intuitive interface for exploring GitHub profiles.
projects.longDescription: Github Profile Finder is a cross-platform mobile application built with Flutter that allows users to search and explore GitHub profiles. The app integrates with GitHub's API to fetch user data, repositories, and other profile information, providing a native mobile experience for GitHub profile exploration.
